sentences.sContent: They turned fire hoses on the people and drenched them.
sentences.sCn: 他们打开消防水龙头朝人群喷去，把他们浇湿。

sentences.sContent: ...the idea of spending two whole days hanging on to a raft and getting drenched by icy water.
sentences.sCn: …在筏子上飘流整整两天并让冰冷的水湿透的想法。

trans.tranOther: To drench something or someone means to make them completely wet
